content:
Good morning.
I have an important doubt about translation.
When I see the layout the label 'Advanced Search' continues in english but in 'Bundles_pt.properties' it is translated. This properties file was already imported to dataverse. Why is this happening? Thanks in advance.
dataverse_portugues.jpg
sender_full_name: AdÃ­lia Isabel Domingues da Cruz Alves

content: @AdÃ­lia Isabel Domingues da Cruz Alves you know, I was just telling @Omer M Fahim that I haven't gotten translations working in a while but recently he and @Steven Winship did for a pull request (#10158). Let's ask them. It's a bit complicated! :sweat_smile:
@AdÃ­lia Isabel Domingues da Cruz Alves you mentioned 5.12.1 before. That means you're following this, right? https://guides.dataverse.org/en/5.12.1/installation/config.html#internationalization

yeah, when I tried to get translation to work, I could get up to the step where we show the language appearing as a selection option on subnav but when i selected "French", the page wouldn't translate for me. So I couldn't install languages correctly. I can follow up with Steve on the issue at hand and see if he has any inputs.
Thanks. Also, we can create an issue to improve the documentation, if necessary.

@AdÃ­lia Isabel Domingues da Cruz Alves dataverse.search.advancedSearch=Advanced Search

is in our bundle.properties. Can you please provide your copy of Bundles_pt.properties?

Additionally, can you please check your check their log file.If it's not configured correctly there will be a warning. We tried installing Portuguese on our local and it worked.
https://guides.dataverse.org/en/latest/installation/config.html#languages

Exactly Philip those are the instructions I am following.
Thanks.
